metadata.model_name: Zoom Platform Analytics System - Data Expectations, Constraints & Business Rules
metadata.author: Data Governance Specialist
metadata.description: Comprehensive data expectations, constraints, and business rules for Zoom Platform Analytics System

completeness.email: 100% - Must be valid email format and unique
completeness.plan_type: 100% - Must be from: Free, Basic, Pro, Business, Enterprise

accuracy.status_values: Must be: Active, Inactive, Suspended, Deleted

accuracy.host_inclusion: Meeting host must be included as attendee

completeness.resolution_status: 100% - Must be: Open, In Progress, Resolved, Closed

completeness.amount: 100% - Must be positive for revenue events

completeness.license_type: 100% - Must be: Basic, Pro, Business, Enterprise

user_management.USR_002: Plan type must align with assigned license type
user_management.USR_003: Deleted users retain historical data but cannot perform new actions

meeting_management.MTG_001: Host must be automatically included as attendee
meeting_management.MTG_002: Duration must match calculated time difference
meeting_management.MTG_003: Maximum meeting duration is 24 hours (1440 minutes)

attendance_rules.ATT_001: Attendee duration cannot exceed meeting duration
attendance_rules.ATT_002: Join/leave times must be within meeting boundaries

feature_usage.FTR_001: Feature usage must align with user's plan capabilities
feature_usage.FTR_002: Feature names must exist in system catalog

support_tickets.SUP_001: Status workflow: Open -> In Progress -> Resolved -> Closed
support_tickets.SUP_002: Close date must be after open date

billing_events.BIL_001: Revenue events have positive amounts, refunds can be negative
billing_events.BIL_002: Currency must match user's billing region

license_management.LIC_001: End date must be after start date
license_management.LIC_002: License assignment must match user plan type
license_management.LIC_003: One active license per type per user

data_privacy.PII_001: Email and User_Name must be masked for non-authorized users
data_privacy.PII_002: Deleted user PII must be anonymized after retention period

data_quality.DQ_001: All foreign key relationships must be maintained
data_quality.DQ_002: Transactional data must meet SLA timeframes

policies.data_quality_assurance: Ensures all data meets quality standards

enforcement_levels.STRICT: System-enforced constraints that prevent data entry
enforcement_levels.BUSINESS: Business logic rules validated during processing
